titleStmt.title: Heautonaparnumenos: or A treatise of self-denyall. Intended for the pulpit; but now committed to the presse for the publike benefit.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-lane.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Hooker by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
